titleStmt.title: Sir John Evelyn his report from the committee appointed to consider of the printing of the Lord Digbyes speech concerning the bill of attainder of the Earl of Strafford whereunto is added the order for the burning of the said speech.
titleStmt.author: Evelyn, John, Sir, 1591-1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
